level.heading: District of Columbia Wells Maintenance Fund; establishment; financing.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 612(d) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-105, June 20, 2003, 50 DCR 5613).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 612(d) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-149, September 22, 2003, 50 DCR 8360).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 8-102.03.
